00044 using namespace urbi;
00045 using libport::program_name;
00046 
00047 static UCallbackAction
00048 onError(const UMessage& msg)
00049 {
00050   GD_FERROR("%s: load module error: %s", program_name(), msg.message);
00051   return URBI_CONTINUE;
00052 }
00053 
00054 static UCallbackAction
00055 onDone(const UMessage&)
00056 {
00057   ::exit(0);
00058 }
00059 
00060 static int
00061 connect_plugin(const std::string& host, int port,
00062                const libport::cli_args_type& modules)
00063 {
00064   UClient cl(host, port);
00065   if (cl.error())
00066     // UClient already displayed an error message.
00067     ::exit(1);
00068   cl.setErrorCallback(callback(&onError));
00069   cl.setCallback(callback(&onDone), "output");
00070   foreach (const std::string& m, modules)
00071     cl << "loadModule(\"" << m << "\");";
00072   cl << "output << 1;";
00073   while (true)
00074     sleep(1);
00075   return 0;
00076 }
00077 
00078 static void
00079 usage(libport::OptionParser& parser)
00080 {
00081   std::cout <<
00082     "usage: " << program_name() <<
00083     " [OPTIONS] MODULE_NAMES ... [-- UOPTIONS...]\n"
00084     "Start an UObject in either remote or plugin mode.\n"
00085               << parser <<
00086     "\n"
00087     "MODULE_NAMES is a list of modules.\n"
00088     "UOPTIONS are passed to urbi::main in remote and start modes.\n"
00089     "\n"
00090     "Exit values:\n"
00091     "  0  success\n"
00092     " " << EX_NOINPUT << "  some of the MODULES are missing\n"
00093     " " << EX_OSFILE << "  libuobject is missing\n"
00094     "  *  other kinds of errors\n"
00095     ;
00096   ::exit(EX_OK);
00097 }
00098 
00099 
00100 static
00101 void
00102 version()
00103 {
00104   std::cout << urbi::package_info() << std::endl
00105             << libport::exit(EX_OK);
00106 }

00108 
00109 static
00110 int
00111 urbi_launch_(int argc, const char* argv[], UrbiRoot& urbi_root)
00112 {
00113   libport::program_initialize(argc, argv);
00114 
00115   // The options passed to urbi::main.
00116   libport::cli_args_type args;
00117 
00118   args << argv[0];
00119 
00120   libport::OptionValue
00121     arg_custom("start using the shared library FILE", "custom", 'c', "FILE"),
00122     arg_pfile("file containing the port to listen to", "port-file", 0, "FILE");
00123   libport::OptionFlag
00124     arg_plugin("start as a plugin uobject on a running server", "plugin", 'p'),
00125     arg_remote("start as a remote uobject", "remote", 'r'),
00126     arg_start("start an urbi server and connect as plugin", "start", 's');
00127   libport::OptionsEnd arg_end;
00128 
00129   libport::OptionParser opt_parser;
00130   opt_parser << "Urbi-Launch options:"
00131              << libport::opts::help
00132              << libport::opts::version
00133              << arg_custom
00134 #ifndef LIBPORT_DEBUG_DISABLE
00135              << libport::opts::debug
00136 #endif
00137              << "Mode selection:"
00138              << arg_plugin
00139              << arg_remote
00140              << arg_start
00141              << "Urbi-Launch options for plugin mode:"
00142              << libport::opts::host
00143              << libport::opts::port
00144              << arg_pfile
00145              << arg_end;
00146 
00147   // The list of modules.
00148   libport::cli_args_type modules;
00149   try
00150   {
00151     modules = opt_parser(libport::program_arguments());
00152   }
00153   catch (libport::Error& e)
00154   {
00155     const libport::Error::errors_type& err = e.errors();
00156     foreach (std::string wrong_arg, err)
00157       libport::invalid_option(wrong_arg);
00158   }
00159 
00160   if (libport::opts::version.get())
00161     version();
00162   if (libport::opts::help.get())
00163     usage(opt_parser);
00164 
00165   // Connection mode.
00166   enum ConnectMode
00167   {
00169     MODE_PLUGIN_START,
00171     MODE_PLUGIN_LOAD,
00173     MODE_REMOTE
00174   };
00175   ConnectMode connect_mode = MODE_REMOTE;
00176 
00177   if (arg_plugin.get())
00178     connect_mode = MODE_PLUGIN_LOAD;
00179   if (arg_remote.get())
00180     connect_mode = MODE_REMOTE;
00181   if (arg_start.get())
00182     connect_mode = MODE_PLUGIN_START;
00183 
00185   std::string host = libport::opts::host.value(UClient::default_host());
00186   if (libport::opts::host.filled())
00187     args << "--host" << host;
00188 
00190   int port = libport::opts::port.get<int>(urbi::UClient::URBI_PORT);
00191   if (libport::opts::port.filled())
00192     args << "--port" << libport::opts::port.value();
00193 
00194   if (arg_pfile.filled())
00195   {
00196     std::string file = arg_pfile.value();
00197     if (connect_mode == MODE_PLUGIN_LOAD)
00198       port = libport::file_contents_get<int>(file);
00199     args << "--port-file" << file;
00200   }
00201   args.insert(args.end(), arg_end.get().begin(), arg_end.get().end());
00202 
00203   if (connect_mode == MODE_PLUGIN_LOAD)
00204     return connect_plugin(host, port, modules);
00205 
00206   // Open the right core library.
00207   if (arg_custom.filled())
00208     urbi_root.load_custom(arg_custom.value());
00209   else if (connect_mode == MODE_REMOTE)
00210     urbi_root.load_remote();
00211   else
00212     urbi_root.load_plugin();
00213 
00214   // If URBI_UOBJECT_PATH is not defined, first look in ., then in the
00215   // stdlib.
00216   std::string uobject_path = libport::xgetenv("URBI_UOBJECT_PATH", ".:");
00217 
00218   // Load the modules using our uobject library path.
00219   libport::xlt_advise dl;
00220   dl.ext().path().push_back(uobject_path, ":");
00221   foreach(const std::string& s, urbi_root.uobjects_path())
00222     dl.path().push_back(s);
00223   foreach (const std::string& s, modules)
00224     dl.open(s);
00225 
00226   return urbi_root.urbi_main(args, true, true);
00227 }
00228 
00229 extern "C" int
00230 URBI_SDK_API
00231 urbi_launch(int argc, const char* argv[], UrbiRoot& urbi_root)
00232 {
00233   try
00234   {
00235     return urbi_launch_(argc, argv, urbi_root);
00236   }
00237   catch (const std::exception& e)
00238   {
00239     std::cerr << argv[0] << ": " << e.what() << std::endl
00240               << libport::exit(EX_FAIL);
00241   }
00242 }
